main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

education.description: The ITC Data Science Fellows is a 5-month elite program for excellent STEM graduates inspired by the IDF's 8200 unit's methods. Machine Learning. Data Mining and Data Analysis. Deep Learning. Computer Vision. Natural Language Processing (NLP)

- Leadership and coordination of the UI Team: 6 Developers, 1 QA and 1 Functional Analyst.- Mentor and coach engineers, spend regular 1:1s time and give them feedback in performance reviews. - Understand Avature's business model, product, engineering processes and recruiting procedures. - Development of the strategic work plan using agile methodologies. - Report to the COO.
